org.apache.archiva.repository

Interface EditableRemoteRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EditableRepository, EventSource, RemoteRepository, Repository, RepositoryStorage
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRemoteRepository, BasicRemoteRepository, MavenRemoteRepository

    public interface EditableRemoteRepository
extends EditableRepository, RemoteRepository
    The editable part of a remote repository

    • Method Summary
